attributes.action: Stop Israel attacking Palestine and recognise Palestine as a state
attributes.additional_details: The UK parliamentary has the power to do anything and this petition will save lives, protect the children, help the Palestinian nation to rebuild itself.
attributes.background: Recognise Palestine as a state and declare its independence as one country. Stop Israel trying to occupy Palestine lands. Save children from being killed and support them. Help the dying people trying to protect their country.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Condemn Israel for their treatment of Palestine and Palestinians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585309

Introduce sanctions against Israel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585314

Sanction Israeli individuals and businesses over treatment of Palestinians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585845

UK Government to formally recognise the State of Palestine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585313
